column4: Can anyone say if it is normal for there to be a ~5 second delay after pressing the quit button before the window with the logout options comes up?
Thats what I thought, something is off on my setup.  Seems like things are not running smooth.  I get a little jumpyness is some programs, I don't know if that is related to my logout button issue.
sorry, im not really sure what would be causing it, just wanted to let you know that i dont think it is normal
